author: Miss Zuemy karina Gonzalez mex
title: Miss Zuemy karina Gonzalez mex
text: I order a hoodie in navy with grey hoodie and red zipper,I got a navy with navy hoodie green zipper,and the gloves I ordered from my other account broken, I sent an email to check if I can get what I ordered and as been 3 days and no answer. So far no good, if they change me that horrible hoodie for the one will change my rating.
